content.instruction: You must output only a single JSON object with the following structure:

queries: urban arterial two-way two-lane asphalt pavement distress inspection work zone manual
urban arterial lane closure temporary traffic control signage visibility pedestrian crosswalk bicycle lane inspection
urban road traffic volume below 400 vehicles asphalt surface evaluation work zone safety standards

rules: Do not include explanations, comments, or any other text.
Output between 2 and 3 queries depending on the input.
Each query must be in plain English, no longer than 25 words.
Emphasize technical terms from the Work Zone Manual (e.g., pavement evaluation, work zone safety, lane closure inspection).
Each query should highlight slightly different aspects of the road segment to maximize retrieval coverage.
